name: reloading
description:
wsad/arrow keys to move

e to interact with buttons

r to reload from last checkpoint

use reloading to your advantage to solve the puzzles

be aware, there is a glitch where sometimes you fall through the ground, if you do, just reload, i've not seen it happen more than once in a play through, nor can i get it to happen on command to properly debug, and figure out what is going on.
